steps.text: Access your grocery cart from any screen using this button in the input bar! It shows a green dot when shared with others.
Your list is organized! View 'All Items', or filter by items from specific recipes or those you've added manually.
Tap the circle to check an item off your list. Tap the item's name to edit its quantity or unit.
Share your cart with family or friends! When shared, everyone sees the same items in real-time.
Use the menu for more options like hiding checked items, clearing them, or sharing your list.
